name: The Mysterious Cities of Gold: The Curse of Amirax
name_original: The Mysterious Cities of Gold: The Curse of Amirax
description: A fan sequel to the first season of the anime called The Mysterious Cities of Gold, in JRPG form. In this game you search for 6 more cities of gold (unrelated to the 6 other cities of gold from MCOG season 2, 3 and 4) in a "save the world" style storyline. It was made in 2007 and a lot of the graphics are RPG Maker 2003 stock graphics.
